methods.description: Gets a similarity key for matching purposes for company name data

parameters.name: license
parameters.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

parameters.name: company
parameters.description: Company name from which to generate similarity key

apiDescription: This API provides a similarity key used to match with other similar company name data, including for purposes of deduplication, fuzzy matching, or merging of datasets. A much higher match rate will be achieved by matching on the algorithmically generated similarity key rather than the data itself.
apiTitle: Interzoid Get Company Name Match Similarity Key API
